mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join sys_user u on(u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join sys_role_menu rm on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join sys_menu m on(m.menu_id = rm.menu_id ) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''
